mapper.select: select tp.post_number, tp.user_number, post_title, tu.user_nickname, tc.category_number, tpf.post_file_system_name, tp.post_date from tbl_post tp left outer join tbl_user tu on tp.user_number = tu.user_number left outer join tbl_post_file tpf on tpf.post_number = tp.post_number left outer join tbl_recipe_category trc on trc.post_number = tp.post_number join tbl_category tc on tc.category_number = #{categoryNumber} and trc.category_name = tc.category_name order by tp.post_date desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
select count(post_number) from tbl_recipe_category trc join tbl_category tc on trc.category_name = tc.category_name where tc.category_number =#{categoryNumber}
